sentences.sContent: ‘Is that your best outfit?’ he sneered.
sentences.sCn: “那就是你最好的衣服了？”他讥笑道。

sentences.sContent: ‘You probably wouldn’t understand,’ he said with a sneer.
sentences.sCn: “你可能明白不了。”他冷笑了一声说道。

trans.tranOther: to smile or speak in a very unkind way that shows you have no respect for someone or something
an unkind smile or remark that shows you have no respect for something or someone
